chunks.text: Dear Students, The annual CSO T-shirt and hoodie sale is back! We'll have the classic TeXed Courant logo on T-shirts and sweatshirts as seen in the flyer below. New this year, we have grey T shirts and XXL sizes for all items!! A portion of the proceeds from pink T-shirts will be donated to SPECTRA: The Association for LGBTQ+ Mathematicians, in honor of Professor Aleks Donev. The sale will be Friday, November 21st, 9am-4pm, 13th floor of Warren Weaver Hall . The T-shirts are $20 and the hoodies are $40, everything in black, navy, and green, plus T-shirts in purple, pink, and grey. The sale is CASH ONLY so be sure to bring some. Get a shirt for yourself and another as a last-minute Thanksgiving present for your family and friends! It only happens once a year. Best, Department of Computer Science https://t.e2ma.net/optout/rbve0r/j939hwjc?s=OexfoAQRP2pQnMvTwXebiE882RmDrU4ftFbtuhLF_E8
